description.value: Your broken bones jut at odd angles, yet this pain only adds to your anger and prowess. You add the combined value of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] conditions as a circumstance bonus to damage rolls with your melee attacks (for example, if you were doomed 1 and wounded 2, you would gain a +3 circumstance bonus to your melee damage rolls).

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
